# Downloaded PDF Fixtures

Real-world PDF files used for integration testing.

## Files

| File | Source | License |
|------|--------|---------|
| `pdffill-demo.pdf` | [pdfplumber test suite](https://github.com/jsvine/pdfplumber/blob/stable/tests/pdfs/pdffill-demo.pdf) | MIT |
| `nics-firearm-checks.pdf` | US government (via pdfplumber) | Public domain |
| `scotus-transcript-p1.pdf` | US Supreme Court (via pdfplumber) | Public domain |

## Reproduction

Run `bash tests/fixtures/download_fixtures.sh` from the repository root.
